[module]
path = metaphor.chem_gm.api
name = _api_service
sticker = gm

[addkeytodict]
modeconfigdict = gm, modeconfigdict
groupavailables = gm, groupavailables
dialogdefaults = model, modeldefaults

[updatedict]
groupdict = groupdict
grouptypes = grouptypes

[inserttolist]
#groupdefault = identifiers: 0, smiles: 1

[delfromlist]
#groupdefault = inputs

[extendlist]
add_arg_list = add_arg_list

[hooks]
deepDataAnalysis = deepDataAnalysisGM
getTrainingModule = getTrainingModuleGM
computeLOOTest = computeLOOTestGM
computeBSTest = computeBSTestGM
singleUsageAction = singleUsageActionGM
multiUsageAction = multiUsageActionGM
fillTestFrame = fillTestFrameGM
createTrainingDataTable = createTrainingDataTableGM
